post_text: November 30, 2015 at 4:50 PM#1I am having trouble coming up with the proper syntax for the start of a chain of macros.  What I am looking to do is to have a variable change depending on which page of executors is currently active.  Something like this, with the section with asterisks around it being the trouble spot:setvar $actfixpage = *Active Page*Not sure if this is even possible to work the way I want it to without running the macro each time I switch executor pages, but would definitely save a lot of time if there is a way to make this work.  Any suggestions?Jim
